title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama and other GGUF models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API, exposing sync/async clients and chat/completion helpers.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; fetch-based with full TypeScript definitions.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package adding Ollama LLM, embed and callback handlers via the Python SDK.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing typed builders for chat, completion, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Lightweight Node CLI for chatting, listing and pulling models, built on ollama-js.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-line run commands for Ollama server.

title: ollama-litellm-proxy
summary: LiteLLM proxy adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints on top of Ollama for usage in any OpenAI client.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit app showing RAG pipeline combining Ollama embeddings + chat with local PDF ingestion.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models using slash commands or app mentions.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up Ollama service and runs model-based tests in containers.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama server and CLI, enabling reproducible installs on NixOS or via nix-shell.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async HTTP client for chat, completion, embeddings and model ops.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama REST API with GenServer-backed clients and streaming support.
